name: nativescript-google-maps-sdk
description: Google Maps SDK plugin for Nativescript
author: Dan Prietti <dprietti@gmail.com> (https://github.com/dapriett)

scripts.build.old: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run build.native
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && cd ../demo && ns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm i && cd ../demo && ns run android
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && ns plugin remove nativescript-google-maps-sdk && ns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
